body:
You may want to consider factoring this out into a helper function similar to:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/8874f6f8b4caabf8e0d5d9eb2e11b4d0d24cfffa/tensorflow/java/src/main/native/session_jni.cc#L25

(i.e., add a `requireHandle` method in an anonymous namespace here and use that to reduce duplication)
